channel.title: Projectsticky - building a multi source (for all skillers, pkers and chillers)
channel.description:
Project-sticky- is a project im currently working on with forum member niel1111 and were doing fine .. we got a few problems here and thier but so far so good . This is also my very first project im working on and changing... so congratz to mee :) [size=14pt]this is all happening because of neil1111[/size]
Things to do :
add d claws add custom items
finish donater zone add a few more things for players to do change client layout
Things done: changed home location added a donater portal and location changed drop system now easier to add drops to creatures
what i plan on doing: i plan on making a server source that fits all players... THiers players that like pvp , players that enjoy merching, players that enjoy hacking (that aint an option hopefully theill be banned) :d, you get the point players that like skilling and i actually scetched out in my head what the server will be like... ill have more then 1 home location for example ill have ::skillhome - home for the skillers ::home - general home ::pk home - this will be placednext the the wildy were i will add rock crabs and pk shops for those that only spend thier time pking , i also say to my self that i want a full working server no errors.. but i guess thats asking too much :) well escpecially since i cannot get d claws since my add model wont work :(
where did i get the idea? ------------------------------------ well a few years back i hosted a server called server-lords and i kinda wanted to follow on from that .. also i wanted to sell teach my self how to do basic java codeing so i guess what not a better place to start then a server...
when will you be finished ______________________ well im planning on getting all my ideas into my server by about jan/feb 2011..
question: what are you planning on doing when finished? well to be honest i think i might end up opening to the public.. then ill also release a download of my source and client for those that like it
heres some screen shots
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/pic2.jpg[/img] Doner area
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/pics1.jpg[/img] new home
UPDATE 2ND NOVEMBER
[IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/pic3.jpg[/img] pk home update [IMG]http://i372.photobucket.com/albums/oo162/andythirlwell007/pic4.jpg[/img] added pk home pk home will be a coded home for people who like pking i will ve adding [s]rock crabs[/s] theiving stalls (for cash) and a pk shop that sells god swords ect

item.title: Projectsticky - building a multi source (for all skillers, pkers and chillers)
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

thank you as usual …

and dont forget any ideas on what to add are took into concideration and most likely added/taken out

Read full topic

item.title: Projectsticky - building a multi source (for all skillers, pkers and chillers)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:12, topic:366967”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=463162.msg3387986#msg3387986 date=1288649552]

sorry soulcist… i took your comment into consideration and im not going to add customs… but i need add model working do i can add d claws

I wouldn’t add Dragon Claws either. Do like what I did; just add the Skillcapes and emotes maybe and leave it at that. If others want to add other stuff; then they can add it themselves to be honest.

Rep++ for Development and Inspiration
[/quote]
thank you…
and ok its just theres a big buzz about dragon claws so if i dont add them my server will be somewhat different and thank you for the rep++[/quote]

I suppose this being a player killing role server. I suppose some of the customs should be available. However I would recommend adding them carefully, and almost perfectly. Don’t add them to glitch or something; that would be useless.

The updates are coming along well.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This looks like it’s going to be something. Though I would recommend not adding customs to the server, I would like to see a server without such things.

Good luck though.

item.title: Projectsticky - building a multi source (for all skillers, pkers and chillers)
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:7, topic:366967”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=463162.msg3387881#msg3387881 date=1288644353]
Ah, so 3 things done and 17% finished hm?
Alright, are you new to coding?
And you’re welcome.
[/quote]
yes im new
i find some things difficult but i have a friend to help me

but although thiers some thing we find hard
like adding farming to a new area or getting a stall to work or adding shops …
thier the only 3 things were stuck with atm[/quote]

getting a stall to work is in your object clicking case. case 132:

farming would be more in depth… and I dont have the time to explain that.

adding shops would be in shops.cfg and opening them with either openupshop(ID) or wanneshop.

Read full topic

Are you just posting that you’re only doing this and will post more later?
Or are you like almost done?
But other then that, looks pretty good, not excellent, just pretty good.
Good luck with this project.[/quote]
no ive only just started the project i recon its only roughly 17% done and im hoping with the power of moarscapr forums and rune-server my server will work … but ty for the support
